name: 陳柏全
objective: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
schedule:
Week 01 Review of Continuous Control
Week 02 Analysis of the State Equations
Week 03 Control-Law Design for Full-State Feedback
Week 04 Selection of Pole Locations for Good Design
Week 05 Estimator Design
Week 06 Combined Control Law and Estimator
Week 07 Loop Transfer Recovery
Week 08 Introduction of Reference Input with Estimator
Week 09 Midterm exam
Week 10 Integral Control
Week 11 Dynamic Analysis of Discrete Systems
Week 12 Design by Emulaiton
Week 13 Discrete Design
Week 14 State-space Design
Week 15 Optimal Control
Week 16 Optimal Estimation
Week 17 Multivariable Control Design
Week 18 Final Exam
materials: Textbook: Feedback Control of Dynamic Systems, by Gene F. Franklin, J. David Powell, and Abbas Emami-Naeini
